contentrichtext.text: {{About|the type of headgear||Cap (disambiguation)}} {{more references|date=April 2012}} A '''cap''' is a form of [[headgear]]. Caps have crowns that fit very close to the head and have no [[brim (hat)|brim]] or only a [[visor]]. They are typically designed for warmth and, when including a visor, blocking sunlight from the eyes.
